name: High School Girlfriend Break Up
description:
Fall in love with your crush from high school in this love story. Flirt, get a date, dress up to impress and pick the best outfit!

Help Layla with cleanup games and makeup to get ready for the love game of her dreams. Make choices about what lipstick or outfit she wears and follow the stories of Layla’s student life. Cook and bake a cake for Sam to show your feelings. This love story game could end with a girlfriend break up, but we want to get a kiss!

⬩ High School Crush
Layla is on her first year at high school and her first crush is Sam. Follow the stories and make the choices that she needs to start.

⬩ Clean Up and Makeup
Cleaning games to start the beauty salon for Layla, get read for her first date in student life. Clean her face, do hairstyles, pick outfits and put on makeup.

⬩ Choices
Layla wants to date with Sam, but he doesn’t know her feelings. Should Layla tell Sam, or keep it for herself? Follow the stories to find out!

⬩ Breakup Games
Boys can turn a love story into breakup games with other girls. Play the game with Layla and Sam to know if this romantic first crush is forever.

⬩ Birthday Party
Go to Sam’s birthday party with a homemade cake. Baking a cake and decorating it for Sam. Cooking game for love!

⬩ Girlfriend Break Up
These high school girls have a crush in this love story game between Layla and Sam. Follow the stories and make the right choices to see if it ends with breakup games..

High School Girlfriend Break Up is a great game for girls to explore high school and love. It can be romantic with dating and a kissing game, but it can also be a breakup with tears. Start cooking and baking a cake, make Layla pretty in the beauty salon with makeup, dressup and makeover and go in the stories with the best choices!
